doc.name: unicodeTitle

syntax.example: set the unicodeTitle of stack to titleString

doc.summary: Specifies the string shown in a stack window's title bar as a unicode string.

examples.example: set the unicodeTitle of stack "My Stack" to uniEncode("My Stack's Name")
set the unicodeTitle of stack "My Stack" to tUTF16EncodedString

description.p: Use the unicodeTitle property to set the title of a stack's window to a unicode string, or to get the current title of a stack's window as a unicode string.
The unicodeTitle of an object is a string of double-byte characters in the same format as returned from functions such as uniEncode.

p.font: Cross-platform note: Windows 98SE and Windows ME do not support unicode window titles. On these systems, the string displayed in the title bar will be the closest approximation possible on the running system.
